rows.label: bf01040100_0010
rows.name: An entire horizon of white.

rows.label: bf01040100_0020
rows.name:
A sea of clouds, and at its heart, the
World Tree, piercing the heavens...

rows.label: bf01040100_0030
rows.name: This... This is the world we call home...

rows.label: bf01040100_0032
rows.name: Alst.

rows.label: bf01040100_0040
rows.name: Story goes that when the world was young...

rows.label: bf01040100_0050
rows.name:
People lived together with the God of creation, on top 
of the World Tree.

rows.label: bf01040100_0060
rows.name:
A fertile land built in the skies - a utopia where one 
could turn day to night and rain to sunshine at will.

rows.label: bf01040100_0070
rows.name: They called it...

rows.label: bf01040100_0072
rows.name: "Eden".

rows.label: bf01040100_0080
rows.name:
But then, one day...
humans were cast out.

rows.label: bf01040100_0090
rows.name: Nobody knows why.

rows.label: bf01040100_0100
rows.name:
Did they invoke the wrath of God? 
Or was there some other reason?

rows.label: bf01040100_0110
rows.name:
After being driven from Eden, 
people made their new home in Alst.

rows.label: bf01040100_0120
rows.name: But their lives became short.

rows.label: bf01040100_0130
rows.name: When humanity faced extinction, God took pity on it

rows.label: bf01040100_0140
rows.name: sending his servants, the [System:Ruby rt=Ars - Art or Craft in Latin ]Divine Beasts[/System:Ruby], to save it.

rows.label: bf01040100_0150
rows.name:
The few survivors relocated to the Divine Beasts, 
living alongside them through countless days and nights.

rows.label: bf01040100_0160
rows.name: But now, those Divine Beasts...

rows.label: bf01040100_0170
rows.name: are beginning to die out.

rows.label: bf01040100_0180
rows.name:
A-ah... The brazier does my weary
old bones much good...

rows.label: bf01040100_0190
rows.name: Want me to move it, Gramps?

rows.label: bf01040100_0200
rows.name:
No, that's quite all right. Leave it
right there - a-ah...

rows.label: bf01040100_0210
rows.name: Okay!

rows.label: bf01040100_0220
rows.name:
Again? It's been happening 
more often these days, huh?

rows.label: bf01040100_0230
rows.name: Mm... More so than before.

rows.label: bf01040100_0240
rows.name: I wonder if anyone was living there...

rows.label: bf01040100_0250
rows.name:
It seems not.
And if there had been, they would have all left by now.

rows.label: bf01040100_0260
rows.name: Makes sense...

rows.label: bf01040100_0270
rows.name:
Hey, Gramps, d'you think...Iyasaki
Village will be gone too one day?

rows.label: bf01040100_0280
rows.name:
It would not be today or tomorrow,
but one day, yes, it will fall...

rows.label: bf01040100_0290
rows.name: And you, too?

rows.label: bf01040100_0300
rows.name: That's how it goes with us Divine Beasts...

rows.label: bf01040100_0310
rows.name: There's no way around it.

rows.label: bf01040100_0320
rows.name:
Eventually...
there'll be nowhere left to live.

rows.label: bf01040100_0330
rows.name: Sadly...

rows.label: bf01040100_0340
rows.name:
So... You Divine Beasts were born
up there, is that right?

rows.label: bf01040100_0350
rows.name: So they say, for what it's worth.

rows.label: bf01040100_0360
rows.name: Mind you, I was born here, on Alst.

rows.label: bf01040100_0370
rows.name:
As for my ancestors, who could say
where they were born...

rows.label: bf01040100_0380
rows.name: Can it really exist? The Eden?

rows.label: bf01040100_0390
rows.name: And God who created Alst...

rows.label: bf01040100_0400
rows.name: A land of plenty, atop the World Tree...

rows.label: bf01040100_0410
rows.name:
If such a place did exist, perhaps
we could all live in peace.

rows.label: bf01040100_0420
rows.name: With no need for fighting.

rows.label: bf01040100_0430
rows.name: Sure would be great...

rows.label: bf01040100_0440
rows.name: For everyone...even folks in Iyasaki.

rows.label: bf01040100_0450
rows.name: I wonder what God thinks, looking at this world now.
